# Mouse 
```{r setup, warnining = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(haemdata)
se <- get_data("mmu_mrna_all_GENCODEm28_HLT_qc.rds")

se <- subset(se,
    select = grepl("AML", SummarizedExperiment::colData(se)$project)
)

pca <- pca_se(se)
hlt <- plot_transgenes_se(se)
```

`r pca$biplot`

`r pca$pairs_plot`

`r pca$correlation_plot`

`r hlt`
